jProtocol.helper

Class ByteHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • jProtocol.helper.ByteHelper

  • public class ByteHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Some convenience methods used for byte array conversions.
    Author:
    Tom Petersen, 2015

      ByteHelper()

      • hexStringToBytes

        public static byte[] hexStringToBytes(java.lang.String s)
        Converts a hex encoded byte string to a byte array.
        Parameters:
        s - the hex string, e.g. 00 5f 73 f4 (without spaces)
        Returns:
        the resulting byte array

      • bytesToHexString

        public static java.lang.String bytesToHexString(byte[] bytes)
        Converts a byte array to a hex encoded byte string.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the byte array
        Returns:
        the resulting hex string

      • concatenate

        public static byte[] concatenate(byte[] a,
                                 byte[] b)
        Concatenates two byte arrays.
        Parameters:
        a - byte array a
        b - byte array b
        Returns:
        the concatenated byte array [a]+[b]

      • longToByteArray

        public static byte[] longToByteArray(long l)
        Creates byte array of bytes of a long variable.
        Parameters:
        l - the long variable
        Returns:
        the bytes

      • intToByteArray

        public static byte[] intToByteArray(int value)
        Converts an int value to a four byte array.
        Parameters:
        value - the int value
        Returns:
        the byte array (big endian)

      • byteArrayToInt

        public static int byteArrayToInt(byte[] b)
        Converts a four byte array to its int value.
        Parameters:
        b - the byte array (big endian)
        Returns:
        the int value

      • intToThreeByteArray

        public static byte[] intToThreeByteArray(int value)
        Converts an int value to a three byte array. The first byte of the int value will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        value - the int value
        Returns:
        the byte array (big endian)

      • threeByteArrayToInt

        public static int threeByteArrayToInt(byte[] b)
        Converts a three byte array to its int value.
        Parameters:
        b - the byte array (big endian)
        Returns:
        the int value

      • intToTwoByteArray

        public static byte[] intToTwoByteArray(int value)
        Converts an int value to a two byte array. The first two bytes of the int value will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        value - the int value
        Returns:
        the byte array (big endian)

      • twoByteArrayToInt

        public static int twoByteArrayToInt(byte[] b)
        Converts a two byte array to its int value.
        Parameters:
        b - the byte array (big endian)
        Returns:
        the int value
